name: Yalla Baloot & Hand
description:
Dear friends, do you miss the old days playing baloot with your lovely friends in real life? Regardless of the distance, come to Yalla Baloot & Hand!

Yalla Baloot is a casual online baloot game. You can meet more friends who like baloot, or you can invite real life friends to play games together.

Features:

Classic Baloot
Classic online Baloot game with real game atmosphere. Real-time voice in the game makes the competition more interesting.

Variety of Hand
Play online Hand games with friends which simulate real-life circumstances. The game includes Hand and Hand Saudi.

League Match
Play with high-level players and show your extraordinary game skills. You can get limited rewards and compete for the champion!

Public Room
Create your own room, personalize room rules and enjoy games with friends.

Exquisite Skins
A variety of personalized skins. You can choose your favorite card and theme, using in the game.

Rich Social Elements
The lively global chat and private personal chat provide you with more places to communicate with your friends.

We will provide more interesting features to enrich your daily life.
Any suggestions or questions, please contact our feedback team: balootsupport@yalla.live
